channel.title: Can someone help me with a "tool"
channel.description: Alright im using PI 317 and i need a equipment.dat editor if someone has 1. It would make my life so much easyer. Or if anyone has any ohter ideas on how to modify that file let me know :)

item.title: Can someone help me with a "tool"
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

HxD Hex Editor
every byte references an itemID.
the first one would be item of id 0 - Dwarf remains
To find the byte to edit

open your file in HxD Hex Editor - Press Ctrl + g for the goto command
Select “dec” as the input mode and make sure the offset “beginning”.
type in your itemID
The byte that the cursor is right next to is the one you want to edit.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with a "tool"

item.title: Can someone help me with a "tool"
item.dc:creator: @5oulreaper 5oulreaper
item.description:
@5oulreaper wrote:

Pure_:

It’s in a binary format, just check how it’s parsed then edit it as so (post the code which reads it, if you want further help, that way i can tell you what is what).

perhaps you have Skype? so we can talk
